description: a(n) = usigma(n) - n, where usigma(n) = sum of unitary divisors of n (A034448).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
C. Pomerance and H.-S. Yang, Variant of a theorem of Erdős on the sum-of-proper-divisors function, Mathematics of Computation, to appear c. 2014
mathematica: usigma[n_] := Sum[ If[GCD[d, n/d] == 1, d, 0], {d, Divisors[n]}]; a[n_] := usigma[n] - n; Table[ a[n], {n, 1, 82}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 15 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
